channel.title: Web on Bianca Rosa
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Bianca Rosa

item.title: Playing with Django Rest Framework
item.description: This is the first of a series of posts that I will write to share some knowledge I gained on Python Web Frameworks plus a nice, public way to push me into learning more and more about them. Iâ€™ve decided to do the same project on all of them, starting with Django Rest Framework. This is will be a standalone analysis and then I will move forward to comparisons. My intention is to find a good framework to plug into a database and see how well it handles GET requests.
